name: goldfish
notes:
little goldfish friends for the aquarium enthusiast.....who doesn't have an aquarium. 

the pattern and tutorial is available here:
https://youtu.be/jx8vkn_s0ni

pattern details:
hook size: 3.5mm
yarn: 8ply
terms: us
difficulty: beginner
finished size: 12cm

materials & supplies
to make this pattern you will need:
• yarn
• scissors
• stitch markers
• needle
• pins
• stuffing
• 12mm safety eyes
